m_szDocSumamry: Honda Clarity Fuel Cell To Be On Display At The New York International Auto Show By Mark Lelinwalla ,      Tech Times  |  March 21, 10:49 AM Finally, auto enthusiasts will have their first look at the U.S. spec version of the highly-anticipated model. (Photo : Honda) The auto industry has been hearing about it since last fall and now we will finally get that first look. Honda is set to give both the media and consumers, alike, a highly-anticipated first look at the United States spec version of its Clarity Fuel Cell sedan this week at the New York International Auto Show, beginning Wednesday.
